title: Please help me identify this extended serif face...
content:
Hey,

Does anyone have any idea what this font is based on or even a something that it resembles? It's not a piece of work I've done so I really have no idea.

All I know is that it was a clean font before it was made to look distressed so ignore all of the chips and dings.

Thanks a lot!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071325im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontsample_4099.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fontsample.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071325/http:/typophile.com/files/fontsample.png) | 28.05 KB |
author: Stackhaus23

comments.content: Oh my god, I think you could definitely be correct and now I feel a little bit sick. Squooshing... oh no.
Yeah I literally did a font sample on their site and overlayed it. That's definitely it. They've just meddled around with the serifs slightly. Thanks a lot Jan, that's a great help!
